channel.title: What are those things in the URL called? (the hash thing #)
channel.description: Hola! You know sometimes a url will be like [url=http://www.somesite.com/index.html#llama]http://www.somesite.com/index.html#llama[/url], well whats the "#" part called, it also takes you to different parts of the page sometimes

item.title: What are those things in the URL called? (the hash thing #)
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

thanks!

item.title: What are those things in the URL called? (the hash thing #)
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

#curry

would link to the anchor curry on that page. So if you click a link that goes to #ya mum. If theres an anchor called ya mum or title or word called ya mum it takes you to that.

Read full topic
